Text: Thank you! Been a long time after that album, seemed to be out of print.
At last. Been waitin' for this for ages. Thank You very much! You don't by any chance have their second album as well? I lost both of mine the last time i moved...God Bless ya'

Hi guys,

Spent ages looking for the album myself, thats why I shared it when I got it.  For their other stuff check out

http://www.valentine69.com/

Go to links and click on wb mp3 page.

Red.
